According to Marca, Real Madrid was the dream club for Neymar when he was 16 years old.

Neymar is close to leaving Barcelona and the potential destination of Brazilian is Paris Saint Germain, who has decided to pay the release clause of 222 million euros.

Before transferring to Barcelona, Neymar was also wanted by Real Madrid, who his dream club.

This was revealed by Marca from an interview extracted from the archive when Neymar was only 16 years old.

“The Dream Club? Real Madrid, “Neymar said, writes Marca.
“Favourite players? Zidane, Kaka Ronaldinho and Robinho”

After El Clasic, where Barcelona won 3: 2, according to Marca and AS, Neymar greeted with Real Madrid players and former Los Blancos player Baptista.

He stayed in the Madrid dressing room for 15 minutes as he left woth two Real Madrid shirts.
